1.title: Handstand Flow Intro

episode of.title: Gaiam: Patrick Beach Yoga - Operation Take Flight (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Patrick introduces you to his signature yoga pose - the handstand.

2.title: Handstand Flow

episode of.title: Gaiam: Patrick Beach Yoga - Operation Take Flight (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: In this fast-moving flow practice, Patrick introduces opportunities to go upside down in several accessible ways. The various postures will open your hips, hamstrings and shoulders, while also opening your mind to the possibilities of adding inversions to your practice.

3.title: Forearm Balance Flow Intro

episode of.title: Gaiam: Patrick Beach Yoga - Operation Take Flight (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Patrick introduces his Forearm Balance Flow.

4.title: Forearm Balance Flow

episode of.title: Gaiam: Patrick Beach Yoga - Operation Take Flight (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Elongate the spine and push energy through your body with this Forearm Balance Flow. Featuring side and forearm plank poses, this energizing practice will get you prepared, mentally and physically, to balance on your forearms, if you so choose.

5.title: Twisted Inversions Intro

episode of.title: Gaiam: Patrick Beach Yoga - Operation Take Flight (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Patrick introduces his Twisted Inversions practice.

6.title: Twisted Inversions

episode of.title: Gaiam: Patrick Beach Yoga - Operation Take Flight (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Patrick guides you through this playful practice that will help create a sense of balance, while also strengthening the core. He starts with seated twists, and as the practice continues, moves to more challenging postures, including inversion twists.

7.title: Funky Arm Variations Intro

episode of.title: Gaiam: Patrick Beach Yoga - Operation Take Flight (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Patrick introduces his Funky Arm Variations practice.

8.title: Funky Arm Variations

episode of.title: Gaiam: Patrick Beach Yoga - Operation Take Flight (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Designed to strengthen and build symmetry within the body, Patrick challenges you to try different postures with a focus on your non-dominate arm.

episode of.title: Gaiam: Patrick Beach Yoga - Operation Take Flight (TV Series 2014– )

10.title: Restorative Practice

episode of.title: Gaiam: Patrick Beach Yoga - Operation Take Flight (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Rest and restore. Patrick guides you through this restorative yoga practice that will slow you down and give your body a chance to recover. The stretching and lengthening postures will allow you to sink into the floor in true relaxation mode.

11.title: Interview

episode of.title: Gaiam: Patrick Beach Yoga - Operation Take Flight (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Learn more about Patrick Beach and his practice in this interview.

imdb.plot outline: Ready for takeoff? Patrick Beach's Operation Take Flight Yoga is aimed at getting you and your body comfortable with the idea of going upside down. Patrick prepares your body for these poses, gives you the tools you need to calmly move into inverted postures, and demonstrates movements designed to help you get more comfortable being there. Regardless of the poses or modifications you take throughout the practices, you will gain a better understanding and awareness of your body and how you move.
imdb.title: Gaiam: Patrick Beach Yoga - Operation Take Flight
plot: Ready for takeoff? Patrick Beach's Operation Take Flight Yoga is aimed at getting you and your body comfortable with the idea of going upside down. Patrick prepares your body for these poses, gives you the tools you need to calmly move into inverted postures, and demonstrates movements designed to help you get more comfortable being there. Regardless of the poses or modifications you take throughout the practices, you will gain a better understanding and awareness of your body and how you move.
